solution_line_template: Donna can finish a total of {episodes_per_weekday} x {num_weekdays} = <<{episodes_per_weekday}*{num_weekdays}={weekday_total}>>{weekday_total} episodes during the weekdays.

Meanwhile, she can finish {episodes_per_weekday} x {weekend_multiplier} = <<{episodes_per_weekday}*{weekend_multiplier}={episodes_per_weekend_day}>>{episodes_per_weekend_day} episodes each day during the weekend.
The total number of episodes she can watch every weekend is {episodes_per_weekend_day} x {num_weekend_days} = <<{episodes_per_weekend_day}*{num_weekend_days}={weekend_total}>>{weekend_total}
Therefore, Donna can watch {weekday_total} + {weekend_total} = <<{weekday_total}+{weekend_total}={total_episodes}>>{total_episodes} episodes every week.
